carpet.rule.noMiningSlowDown.desc: No mining slowdown when the player is in fluids, cobwebs, or under mining fatigue.
carpet.rule.anvilNeverDamageByFalling.de: When enabled, anvils will not be damaged by falling from heights.
carpet.rule.beaconLagOptimization.desc: When enabled, reduces performance impact caused by beacons.
carpet.rule.ItemFrameAlwaysStayAttach.de: When enabled, item frames always stay attached.
carpet.rule.enableFastOpCommand.desc: When enabled, provides faster access to OP commands.
carpet.rule.enableEntitySearchCommand.de: When enabled, provides faster EntitySearch command support.
carpet.rule.entitySearchCommandEnableXae: When enabled, provides EntitySearch minimap waypoint support.
carpet.rule.itemDespawnImmediately.desc: When enabled, dropped items will despawn instantly.
carpet.rule.itemNeverDespawn.desc: When enabled, dropped items will never despawn.
carpet.rule.enableSpecTPCommand.desc: Use 'sp player' to quickly teleport in spectator mode.
carpet.rule.endermanNeverGetAngryByPlaye: When enabled, Endermen will never become angry at players.
